pr_title: [BEAM-10698] Use unbounded wrapper for Kafka Read.

timeline.bodyText: You'll need to add this experiment to the impacted tests since some tests expect an SDF.
timeline.author: lukecwik

replies.bodyText: I couldn't  find a way to pass experiments into ExpansionService: https://github.com/apache/beam/blob/master/sdks/java/expansion-service/src/main/java/org/apache/beam/sdk/expansion/service/ExpansionService.java#L384-L393 so I just leave the test to verity non-sdf read.
replies.author: boyuanzz

timeline.message: Use unbounded wrapper for Kafka Read.
Use unbounded wrapper for Kafka Read.
